name: Mario.EXE: TheDoomOfCastle (2022 Remake)
description:
Welcome To The Special And Sweet 2022 Remake Of:

From the 2018 game of EdyDude!!

 

Link Of The Original Game: https://gamejolt.com/games/Marioexetdoc/363471

2022 Remake By: Myself! (A.K.A BlixerTheGamer)

 

Coding: BlixerTheGamer

Voices:

Luigi: Uberduck.ai, Luigi Mansion.

Sprites: TheSpritesResource,Custom Sprites, My Custom Style.

Music:

1- Warning screen: Baldi Basic's+

2- "Original Game By EdyDude Jingle: Super Swunsh World - Copyright jingle

3- Title Screen: SuperMarioAllStar

4- Select screen: Also SuperMarioAllStar (SMB2 game)

5- First Level: SMW Custom Music - NSMB Overworld

(Link of Music: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jkyntiknzNg)

6- First Level (Second Phase) - The same more like 5 but....reversed

7- First Level (Third Phase) - the same like 6 but slowed

7.1- Mario.exe NPC Cutscene - The coronation day' (The Death)

8- Hell level (Luigi) - The coronation day' (The Death)

9- Chase theme - SMW custom Music - Sonic 1 Drowning theme (Music by: me)

10- Spike chase - SMW Custom Music - Fatal Chase

11- Select Screen (Phase 2): The same more like 4 but slowed

*More musics coming soon*

Characters!

Anyway i hope you can play my 2022 remake!

(I did all by myself without help)

Mario is owned by: Nintendo

Sonic.exe is owned by: MY5TCrimson
